views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(

              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )

      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Task",

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Timestamp",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_Action_Audit_SYNCEDRECORD.timestamp,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_Action_Audit_SYNCEDRECORD.timestamp]),

        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_Action_Audit_SYNCEDRECORD.timestamp], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
